渤.definition: same as 渤海[Bo2 Hai3], Bohai Sea between Liaoning and Shandong; Gulf of Zhili or Chihli

渤海.definition: Parhae, Korean kingdom in Manchuria and Siberia, 698-926

渤澥桑田.definition: lit. blue seas where once was mulberry fields (idiom, from 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], Record of the Grand Historian); time brings great changes; life's vicissitudes
